name: Bubble Freedom
description:
Warm up your fingers and get ready to show some fine matching skills in this cool free game!
Download and play the super awesome and addictive Bubble Freedom puzzle game, and discover serious bubble shooting fun. Manage your time, plan your moves, and clear all the bubbles to overcome the obstacles.

Play today, and pop the colorful and bright free puzzle game bubbles, and earn amazing boosters and power-ups to win levels and clear the board.
Win enough points to earn at least one star, and complete the missions to become the winner!

Bubble Freedom is a popular free game for you to enjoy - no wifi and no internet required. Pop colorful balls and balloons, blast fun levels, and experience one of the best and cool free games! This is the ultimate bubble shooter ™ game!

How to Play this cool and popular free game:
- Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to shoot bubbles.
- Match at least 3 balloons of the same color to pop the combination.
- Try to complete thousands of challenging and advanced levels.
- Earn powerful boosters that will help you pop your way to victory:
- Pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a FIREBALL that will burn every bubble on the way.
- Drop 10 balls or more to get a BOMB that will take out surrounding bubbles.
- Plan your shots ahead and reach high scores.

Enjoy Cool Features:
- Challenging levels filled with colorful bubbles.
- Completely free to play and highly addictive!
- Amazing and vibrant graphics.
- A smooth gameplay and hours of endless fun!
- Play online or offline - no wifi and no internet required.

Download Bubble Freedom for free from the store today, and experience an endless amount of bubble popping fun! Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop the bubbles, and use powerful boosts to advance.

Don’t miss out this crazy bubble popping fun, compete against friends and family and see who can reach the highest score and get 3 stars on every level. This free bubble game is one of the best blast puzzle games out there!

Play this free game full of thousands of challenging levels to satisfy your itch for fun puzzles!

All rights of Bubble Shooter ™ are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.
